Class BlueGhost

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Animate
        • Ghost
          • BlueGhost

  • public class BlueGhost
extends Ghost
    BlueGhost extends Ghost. The blue ghost takes the position of both Pacman and red ghost to create a vector, which is then doubled in order to determine the blue ghostâ€™s point of interest.
    Version:
    5/25/17
    Author:
    Marcus Pearce, Justin Hu, Vincent Hwang
